channel.title: How to make a NPC shout?

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Yeah some servers crash when an NPC shouts plus PI is shit.

Edit: I forgot something, you need to send the updateRequired = true; or whatever method it is.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a NPC shout?

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:6, topic:420990”]You just declare the directory of where the Npc class resides in your server. In my server it is

import com.rs2.model.npcs;

You won’t need to import if the file your editing is in the same folder as the Npc class. Now it is imported, you can call any method from the Npc class into the file you’re editing, like so:

Npc.forcedChat = "I am a shouting NPC!";

Not sure about this last one, as I’d have to trial and error it myself without any sort of reference, but you could possibly create a new instance of the Npc class, like so:

npcShout = new Npc.forcedChat();

and then use it accordingly:

npcShout = "I am a shouting NPC!"; [/quote]

All don’t work… I think it can’t anny more with such servers… Sorry 4 wasting ur time

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a NPC shout?

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You just declare the directory of where the Npc class resides in your server. In my server it is

import com.rs2.model.npcs;

You won’t need to import if the file your editing is in the same folder as the Npc class. Now it is imported, you can call any method from the Npc class into the file you’re editing, like so:

Npc.forcedChat = "I am a shouting NPC!";

Not sure about this last one, as I’d have to trial and error it myself without any sort of reference, but you could possibly create a new instance of the Npc class, like so:

npcShout = new Npc.forcedChat();

and then use it accordingly:

npcShout = "I am a shouting NPC!";

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a NPC shout?

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:4, topic:420990”]of course, you’ll need to denote this to a certain Npc which I assume you already know what you’re using it for.

Lastly, don’t forget to import the the Npc class at the top of the file (if your server is packaged) if you haven’t already, otherwise you’ll get the cannot find symbol error.[/quote]

Yeh, i don’t know how to import the Npc class, can you explain please. (:

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a NPC shout?

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You use it as a String, i.e.

forcedChat = "I am a shouting NPC!";

of course, you’ll need to denote this to a certain Npc which I assume you already know what you’re using it for.

Lastly, don’t forget to import the the Npc class at the top of the file (if your server is packaged) if you haven’t already, otherwise you’ll get the cannot find symbol error.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a NPC shout?

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

The Outsider:

Have a look in your NPC class for a forceChat or forcedChat method. If it doesn’t exist then you’ll need to add one.

How do i add, i’m not verry good at addig a method… Never did it so.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a NPC shout?
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

Hello people, i need a code so a NPC could shout something.
Something like c.forcedChat(""); but then for letting a NPC talk.

I’m using Hybrid PVP Version 317.

Please don’t come with the code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Text goes here."; }

Cuz, that won’t work.

Thanks people!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a NPC shout?
